items.content_html: A basic DNS server built with Node.js, leveraging the dgram and dns-packet libraries to handle UDP socket communication and DNS packet encoding/decoding. This lightweight server responds to DNS queries based on a predefined database, showcasing how to implement custom DNS resolution in Node.js.
items.title: Dinesh-manickan/Basic-DNS-Server: A basic DNS server built with Node.js, leveraging the dgram and dns-packet libraries to handle UDP socket communication and DNS packet encoding/decoding. This lightweight server responds to DNS queries based on a predefined database, showcasing how to implement custom DNS resolution in Node.js.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anyGridJs: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
